entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
